column4: The good news is, in grid 0.9 you can drag windows to edges and corners of the screen and they'll be resized that way so you don't need keybindings for it
cool how can i tell which version of grid i have and upgrade if it's not 0.9?
0.9 is the latest development version of compiz. It isn't ready yet though it works already
and by grid 0.9 I meant the version of grid that is compatible with the new code
